column4: hey guys what can I do to speed up a 720p video on my computer
i have a dual cpu 2.8 intel xeon and it still runs slow
with movie player its just a little slow with MPlayer its dead slow
use an appropriate video out device. and don't run beryl/compiz.
thats  what i have and its slow
is it using some funny codec like wmv oder quicktime?
also what about the setting on the bottom
do you know how those setting are suppose to be set ( on the bottom )
